CustomField.description: If checked, gives the option to waive future interest when using Repay Loan to repay full loan. If not checked, interest is NOT waived by default.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, gives the option to waive future interest when using Repay Loan to repay full loan. If not checked, interest is NOT waived by default.
CustomField.label: Recalculate Interest on Prepayment
